mapper.select: select s.*,o.om_name from signet_manage s left join organization_management o on s.om_id=o.om_id left join mode_status m on s.sm_id=m.mode_id where m.status=#{status}
mapper.insert: insert into signet_manage (sm_id,prj_id,task_no, om_id, application_date, signet_name, signet_man,signet_attribute,signet_desc,signet_no) values ( #{signetManage.smId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signetManage.prjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signetManage.taskNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signetManage.omId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signetManage.applicationDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signetManage.signetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signetManage.signetMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signetManage.signetAttribute}, #{signetManage.signetDesc}, #{signetManage.signetNo} )
mapper.update: update signet_manage set prj_id = #{signetManage.prjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_no = #{signetManage.taskNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, om_id = #{signetManage.omId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, application_date = #{signetManage.applicationDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, signet_name = #{signetManage.signetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, signet_man = #{signetManage.signetMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, signet_attribute=#{signetManage.signetAttribute}, signet_desc=#{signetManage.signetDesc} where sm_id = #{signetManage.smId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update signet_manage set status=#{status} where sm_id=#{id}

mapper.select: select count(1) from (SELECT DISTINCT signet_no FROM signet_manage where signet_no like #{year})as a
